channel.title: Comments on: Is being a DBA still sexy?
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Piercey99
item.dc:creator: Piercey99
item.description: Quite a good read, I always like informational pieces. I can't wait to view more like this soon!
item.content:encoded: Quite a good read, I always like informational pieces. I can’t wait to view more like this soon!

item.title: By: Tobiasz Koprowskit (KoprowsiT)
item.dc:creator: Tobiasz Koprowskit (KoprowsiT)
item.description: I not only must, I want agree :) Very good explanation why DBA are sexy, even they are not models :)
item.content:encoded: I not only must, I want agree ðŸ™‚ Very good explanation why DBA are sexy, even they are not models ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.dc:creator: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.description: Before I can explain spatial data storage I need 5 napkins and a notepad. And Erin to give me "that look"
item.content:encoded: Before I can explain spatial data storage I need 5 napkins and a notepad. And Erin to give me “that look”

item.title: By: Jes Schultz Borland (grrlgeek)
item.dc:creator: Jes Schultz Borland (grrlgeek)
item.description: Samuel - awesome! I'm glad to know there are BI devs who know we're needed!
item.content:encoded: Samuel – awesome! I’m glad to know there are BI devs who know we’re needed!

item.title: By: Samuel Vanga
item.dc:creator: Samuel Vanga
item.description: Hi, Jes - I agree it will always be sexy! I'm a BI developer and I understand enough to know that without a DBA working to maintain data integrity and availability (and a lot of other things), nothing of what we provide to business users isn't possible, period.
item.content:encoded: Hi, Jes – I agree it will always be sexy! I’m a BI developer and I understand enough to know that without a DBA working to maintain data integrity and availability (and a lot of other things), nothing of what we provide to business users isn’t possible, period.
